text: Balsam Lake is a village of Polk County in the state of Wisconsin in the United States. It is the county seat of Polk County. About 934 people were living in Balsam Lake as of 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== *Balsam Lake Wisconsin - Official Website Category:Villages in Wisconsin Category:County seats in Wisconsin Category:Polk County, Wisconsin
title: Balsam Lake, Wisconsin
